body: Ngl, most of his suck but the Yukina one.

Oh wow, I've been hoping to find this again for a while, I read the 1st 2 chapters ages ago and loved how she liked the guy despite how shitty he was. I happened to read Yukinya! and since it had kind of the same feel I thought I'd read other stuff by the same guy and until he cummed on his unch I wasn't sure if it was just very similar to one of my favorite mangas or if it actually was it.
Anyway maybe I remember wrong but I think the 1st time I read it the translation was different and his reasoning for why she must suck him off to prove she isn't  cheating on him was less clear.
I wanted to like this, but it was surprisingly shitty, the writing is terrible and the illustrations don't make up for it.
